articles.title: Coronavirus: Home Secretary slams 'extraordinary dangerous driving'
articles.description: The Home Secretary says a driver was speeding at 134mph in a 40mph zone in London.
articles.content: VideoHome Secretary Priti Patel has slammed 'extraordinary dangerous driving' during the coronavirus lockdown. She said one driver was caught speeding at 134mph on a 40mph zone in London and speeds of up to 151mph have been clocked on the M1 motorway.
